spec.title: Live Arrivals at Kings Cross St Pancras

options.content:
### Kings Cross Hourly Snapshot

**Updated:** 20 November 2025, 14:00 GMT  
Made during my lunch break before heading to an event near Kings Cross.

**Whats happening right now:**

-  Northern Line is running smoothly  
-  Victoria Line is having a very put-together moment  
-  Metropolitan Line and Hammersmith & City Line are steady with no issues  
-  Piccadilly Line has a bit more going on but everything is still moving  
-  Kings Cross platforms are busy in the classic central London way  
-  Bus routes around Kings Cross (73, 205, 390 and more) are moving with frequent live arrivals

**Data source:**  
Live arrivals are pulled directly from TFLs Unified API and refresh in real time; turning raw transport data into something instantly readable.
